function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on mothers with small children","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the hospitality sector due to job losses among immigrants.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emigration of immigrants from certain european oecd countries","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in colombia and chile","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are more affected by economic downturns due to less stable employment conditions and generally lower seniority at work","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are overrepresented in sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as hospitality and essential health professions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on covid-19 vaccination coverage by country of birth","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequity in covid-19 vaccination coverage between native-born and foreign-born individuals","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess mortality of immigrants due to covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher excess mortality linked to socio-demographic characteristics","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overrepresentation
